document_data.caption: A map of the River of Gold on the Island of Gardens.
document_data.name: Al-Harir River
document_data.mainbody: '''Al-Harir River''', also called the '''River of Gold''', was a beautiful waterway located on the [[Island of Gardens]] within the [[Corsair Domains]] off the coast of northwest [[Zakhara]].
document_data.Description: The river originated atop a high cliff on the island, splitting to the south into two majestic waterfalls. The eastern portion of the river flowed smoothly through jungles as it traveled to the southern regions of the island.
document_data.Inhabitants: The River of Gold was inhabited by a [[zin]] named [[Zthyz al-Zin]] who would confront anyone trying to take water.
